title: Data Analysis: Sampling Distribution
question_text: Suppose a sample of size $ n = 8$ is taken of high school studentsâ€™ ACT scores. If the population mean is $23$ with a standard deviation of $2.4$ , determine the sampling distribution of samples like this of size $n = 8$ .

choices.text: Mean = 23 23 Standard deviation = 2.4 2.4 Shape is approximately normal.
Mean = 23 23 Standard deviation = 0.8485 0.8485 Shape is unable to be determined.
Mean = 23 23 Standard deviation = 2.4 2.4 Shape is unable to be determined.
Mean = 184 184 Standard deviation = 2.4 2.4 Shape is approximately normal.
Mean = 2.875 2.875 Standard deviation = 2.4 2.4 Shape is approximately normal.
